data.text:
Program Areas of Study

Oconee Fall Line Technical College offers a variety of programs of study that can lead to an Associate Degree, Associate of Applied Science Degree, Diploma, or Technical Certificate of Credit. The purpose of these programs is to provide hands-on educational opportunities that will enable students to obtain the knowledge, skills, and attitudes to succeed in the respective fields.

Course Substitutions

If a student transfers into OFTC, general education courses are accepted as substitutions for the program required OFTC general education courses. Substitution charts are listed below:

Diploma or Technical Certificate of Credit Course Substitutions

Associate Degree in Nursing

Associate of Applied Science Degrees - Diagnostic Medical Sonography and Respiratory Care

Associate of Applied Science Degrees - all other Associate Degrees
